  ButtCap, RoundCap, SquareCap

proc bezierCurveTo(path: Path; ctrl1, ctrl2, to: Vec2) {.inline, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Adds a cubic BÃ©zier curve to the current sub-path. It requires three points: the first two are control points and the third one is the end point. The starting point is the latest point in the current path, which can be changed using moveTo() before creating the BÃ©zier curve. Source   Edit

    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Adds a cubic BÃ©zier curve to the current sub-path. It requires three points: the first two are control points and the third one is the end point. The starting point is the latest point in the current path, which can be changed using moveTo() before creating the BÃ©zier curve. Source   Edit

proc closePath(path: Path) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Attempts to add a straight line from the current point to the start of the current sub-path. If the shape has already been closed or has only one point, this function does nothing. Source   Edit

proc quadraticCurveTo(path: Path; ctrl, to: Vec2) {.inline, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Adds a quadratic BÃ©zier curve to the current sub-path. It requires two points: the first one is a control point and the second one is the end point. The starting point is the latest point in the current path, which can be changed using moveTo() before creating the quadratic BÃ©zier curve. Source   Edit   
proc quadraticCurveTo(path: Path; x1, y1, x2, y2: float32) {....raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Adds a quadratic BÃ©zier curve to the current sub-path. It requires two points: the first one is a control point and the second one is the end point. The starting point is the latest point in the current path, which can be changed using moveTo() before creating the quadratic BÃ©zier curve. Source   Edit   
proc rect(path: Path; rect: Rect; clockwise = true) {.inline, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Adds a rectangle. Clockwise param can be used to subtract a rect from a path when using even-odd winding rule. Source   Edit

    tags: [], forbids: [].}
